Greetings!  This is our first Offer post!  We are a new company!  I actually started in the hosting industry in 2002 and have been around for awhile, but this is my first attempt at VPS services-- so any feedback is very welcome.   Discount Code for trying our services!  One month at 50% off.   Enter **LET50** at checkout!

Arcanum Services LLC ("ServerHand") is proud to provide the following VPS services on our Xeon-based SSD VPS servers.

We have servers in Miami, FL & New York City. (Coming soon: NYC VPS Node) Please feel free to browse our site for more information.

Payment options are Authorize.net with fraud checking enabled.   We do not store your credit card number on our servers, everything is stored at Authorize.net related to your transaction information--  Arcanum Services LLC will never see your credit card number.

As a new company, we want everything to be perfect.  If you find something you would like added or changed, please feel free to let me know.      

Please give us a try! **- Instant Setup after Payment-**

SolusVM OpenVZ VPSs

100% Uptime Guarantee

We offer a 100% uptime guarantee with all of our plans which is monitored by reliable third party companies. Whether it's the day or night, you can be confident that your website is safe in our professional hands.


30 Days Money Back Guarantee

We also endow with a 30-days money back guarantee whereby you can claim your money back in full within a month of signing up without any questions asked.


24/7 Support

Our experts are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week by customer desk, live chat & by phone for those times when you need help. Whether you need help with server assistance, registration of domains, transferring domain and websites, hosting related issues, control 
panel guidance we are here to assist you!
